import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import disLiked from "../../assets/img/favorite.svg" import liked from "../../assets/img/like.svg" import Trailer_btn from "../../assets/img/Trailer-button.svg" import star from "../../assets/img/star-rate.svg" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {delete_Favourite} from '../../reducks/favourites/operations' const FavCard = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
{dispatch(delete_Favourite(props.movie.id))}}/> {/* {favourite.length ? ({deleteFavouriteMovie(props.movie)}}/> ):({favouriteMovie(props.movie)}}/>)} */}

{props.movie.name}

{props.movie.rate} {props.movie.total_rate}

) } export default FavCard
